fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose to restrain yourself.
- Visit a target and shoot everyone who visits them. (1 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Redirect and roleblock immune.
- You will shoot anyone who visits you unless you restrain yourself.
- Restraining yourself gives you one use of your second ability.
- You may use your second ability on as many people as you have uses, and each visit costs one use. You will still shoot your own visitors and cannot restrain yourself if you visit someone else.
